species.name: tentacruel
descriptions: Although these Pokémon are rare, when a large outbreak of them occurs, all fish Pokémon disappear from the surrounding sea.
In battle, it extends all 80 of its tentacles to entrap its opponent inside a poisonous net.
It alerts others to danger by stridently flashing the red orbs on its head.
It communicates with others of its kind by lighting up the red orbs on its head. When the orbs are blinking, it’s a warning sign.
It extends its 80 tentacles to form an encircling poisonous net that is difficult to escape.

abilities.name: clear-body
abilities.effect: Prevents stats from being lowered by other Pokémon.

abilities.name: liquid-ooze
abilities.effect: Damages opponents using leeching moves for as much as they would heal.

abilities.name: rain-dish
abilities.effect: Heals for 1/16 max HP after each turn during rain.
